transcript.sentence: The following preview has been approved for all audiences

He glances towards the phone and reaches for it.
in a world connected by technology.

The room is dark, except for the light from the phone.
The screen goes black and text appears.

An iPhone sits in front of him.
The man looks from side to side.
The man drives a car with phone in hand.
An image of the phone appears with the text. Try me.
The man looks in the mirror and adjusts his hair with his hand.
The screen turns red, and the lights blank
The man's eyes widen, and he pushes his back against the seat.

a car, speeds and turns a corner.

He looks back at the phone,
the text flashes, then fades away.
